---@class ecs_helper
local ecs_helper = 
{
    cname = "ecs",
    
    ---ECS路径
    ---@public
    path = "game/systems/battle/ecs/",
    
    ---是否是debug模式
    ---@public
    is_debug = false,
}

---清理
---@public
function ecs_helper.clear(t)
    if t == nil then return end

    for key, _ in pairs(t) do
        t[key] = nil
    end
end

---清理数组
---@public
function ecs_helper.clear_array(arr)
    if arr == nil then return end

    for i = 1, #arr do
        arr[i] = nil
    end
end

--region 日志
---打印Info日志
---@public
function ecs_helper.log(...) 
    if not ecs_helper.is_debug then return end

    log.info(...)
end

---打印Error日志
---@public
---@return void
function ecs_helper.error(...)
    log.error(...)
end

---断言d
---@public
function ecs_helper.assert(condition, ...)
    if not condition then
        ecs_helper.error(...)
    end
end
--endregion

return ecs_helper
